name: Hands Off (GradienGames)
description:
"hands off" is my submission of the Game Maker's Tool Kit game  jam,

you play as this guy with massive hands, you move and catch rotating die to increase your score! and your score increases by the number that is on the dice... however if the symbol on the dice isn't a number you will lose health.

every 40 seconds you can use your score to buy upgrades!

note : the music lag between scenes is currently unfixable, but for some reason it works fine in the windows version, sorry!
